titles: The great wickedness, and mischievous effects of slandering, represented in a sermon preached at St. Giles without Cripplegate, on Sunday Nov. 15, 1685 by Edward Fowler, D.D. ; together with a preface and conclusion in his own vindication.
author: Fowler, Edward, 1632-1714.
notes: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
